% eng-rubrics PDF styling
% Included via pandoc --include-in-header

% ============================================
% COLORS
% ============================================
\usepackage{xcolor}
\definecolor{engblue}{HTML}{1F4E79}
\definecolor{headerblue}{HTML}{2E75B6}
\definecolor{tablebg}{HTML}{2E75B6}
\definecolor{lightgray}{HTML}{F2F2F2}
\definecolor{borderblue}{HTML}{9CC2E5}

% ============================================
% SECTION HEADINGS
% ============================================
\usepackage{titlesec}

% H1 - Main title (blue, large, no rule)
\titleformat{\section}
  {\color{engblue}\normalfont\Large\bfseries}
  {}{0em}{}

% H2 - Competency areas (blue, medium, no rule)
\titleformat{\subsection}
  {\color{engblue}\normalfont\large\bfseries}
  {}{0em}{}

% H3 - Sub-sections like "Scoring Matrix" (blue, normal size)
\titleformat{\subsubsection}
  {\color{engblue}\normalfont\normalsize\bfseries}
  {}{0em}{}

% H4 - Time/framework line (italic, small, on its own line)
\titleformat{\paragraph}[block]
  {\normalfont\small\itshape}
  {}{0em}{}
\titlespacing*{\paragraph}{0pt}{4pt}{6pt}

% Reduce spacing around headings
\titlespacing*{\section}{0pt}{12pt}{4pt}
\titlespacing*{\subsection}{0pt}{14pt}{2pt}
\titlespacing*{\subsubsection}{0pt}{10pt}{4pt}

% ============================================
% TABLE STYLING
% ============================================
\usepackage{longtable}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{array}
\usepackage{colortbl}
\usepackage{float}

% Table cell padding
\renewcommand{\arraystretch}{1.5}
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{8pt}

% Set border color for rules
\arrayrulecolor{borderblue}

% ============================================
% PARAGRAPH & LIST STYLING
% ============================================
\usepackage{setspace}
\setstretch{1.15}

\setlength{\parskip}{6pt}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\usepackage{enumitem}
\setlist{nosep, leftmargin=1.5em, topsep=2pt}
\setlist[itemize]{label=\textbullet}

% ============================================
% FONTS
% ============================================
\usepackage{fontspec}
\setmainfont{DejaVu Sans}

% ============================================
% LINKS
% ============================================
\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{
  colorlinks=true,
  linkcolor=engblue,
  urlcolor=engblue
}

% ============================================
% HORIZONTAL RULES
% ============================================
% Make --- produce a thin gray rule
\renewcommand{\rule}[2]{\textcolor{borderblue}{\hrule height 0.5pt}}
